## Scalar.Clamp() method

Returns the value itself if it's between min and max. Returns min if the value is lower than min. Returns max if the value is greater than max.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Clamp(value: number, min?: number, max?: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>number</code> | the value to clmap |
|  min | <code>number</code> | the min value to clamp to (default: 0) |
|  max | <code>number</code> | the max value to clamp to (default: 1) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the clamped value
